heading_tag.label: Heading tag
heading_tag.info: Specify heading code types for SEO and search engines for crawling purposes.

product_label.info: Use a dynamic source to highlight a unique attribute by creating product label. [Learn more](https://shinedezigninfonet.com/yuva-documentation/#Productlabels).

recent_product_info.label: Section is hidden if no products have been visited.

enable_language_selector.heading: Language Selector
enable_language_selector.content: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)
enable_language_selector.info: This selector will not be visible on mobile.
enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector

show_currency.heading: Currency Selector
show_currency.content: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)
show_currency.info: This selector will not be visible on mobile.
show_currency.label: Enable currency converter

bgimage.info: Only applicable with background style option Image.
bgimage.label: Background image

date.info: The countdown date must be set to a future date and include the following format: DD/MM/YYYY Example: 20/08/2022.
date.label: Countdown date

date.info: The end date must be set to a future date and include the following format: DD/MM/YYYY Example: 20/08/2022.
date.label: End date

hide_section.label: Hide section when date is passed

overlay_color.info: Only applicable if show as banner is selected.
overlay_color.label: Overlay

fullwidth_banner.label: Enable fullwidth banner
fullwidth_banner.info: Fullwidth banner will work when the 'Show as banner' is checked.

custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other liquid code to create advanced customizations.
custom_liquid.label: Liquid

product_as_stacked.label: Show products as stacked
product_as_stacked.info: It will not work with "Full width" and "Show products over image". Also it shows a maximum of 6 products.

over_image_product.label: Show products over image
over_image_product.info: It is applicable only when full width is not enabled.

btnlink.info: This will work with style "Content left, grid right" only.
btnlink.label: Link

btntext.info: This will work with style "Content left, grid right" only.
btntext.label: Text

description.label: Description

collections_per_row.info: This will work with style "Content left, grid right" only.
collections_per_row.label: Number of columns in a row

emphasize_center_image.info: This will work with style "Content left, grid right" and number of columns in a row is 3.
emphasize_center_image.label: Emphasize center image

enable_fullwidth.label: Enable full width
enable_fullwidth.info: It is applicable only if "Content top, grid bottom" style is selected.

btnlink.info: This will work with style "Content left, grid right" only.
btnlink.label: Link

btntext.info: This will work with style "Content left, grid right" only.
btntext.label: Text

description.info: This will work with style "Content left, grid right" only.

custom_liquid.label: Liquid

heading.info: Heading is required for mobile view.
heading.label: Heading

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings -> social media.

follow_on_shop.label: Follow on shop
follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop).

enable_language_selector.heading: Language Selector
enable_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

show_currency.heading: Currency Selector
show_currency.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)
show_currency.label: Enable currency converter

paragraph.info: Not applicable to the hamburger menu.

title.info: Enter a menu item to apply a mega menu. [Learn more](https://shinedezigninfonet.com/yuva-documentation/?locale=en#idocs_megamenu1).

paragraph.info: Not applicable to the hamburger menu.

support_region.info: Add region item in section blocks with type "Supported region". It will not be applicable with the "Logo center, hamburger menu" in mobile-view.
support_region.heading: Heading

enable_language_selector.heading: Language Selector
enable_language_selector.content: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)
enable_language_selector.info: This selector will not be visible on desktop.
enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector

show_currency.heading: Currency Selector
show_currency.content: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)
show_currency.info: This selector will not be visible on desktop.
show_currency.label: Enable currency converter

enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.
enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header

enable_sticky_cart.info: It will not work with sticky header.
enable_sticky_cart.label: Enable sticky cart

enable_transparent_header.info: It will be applicable to homepage only. It will not be applicable to "Full width menu" and "Full width header with searchbar".
enable_transparent_header.label: Enable transparent header

error_note.info: Note - Not applicable to "Logo centered with hamburger" and "Mobile hamburger".

logo_position.info: Only applicable on the "Full width menu".
logo_position.label: Logo alignment

type_font_size.label: Font size
type_font_size.info: It will not be applicable with the "Logo center, hamburger menu".

menu_position.info: Only applicable on the "Full width menu" and "Full width header with searchbar".
menu_position.label: Menu alignment

enable_catalog_drawer.label: Show catalog in drawer on desktop
enable_catalog_drawer.info: It will not be applicable with the "Logo center, hamburger menu".

menu_navigations.label: Open by
menu_navigations.info: It is applicable only on desktop and will not work with a logo center, hamburger menu type.

sort.info: Only applicable if all collections is selected.
sort.label: Sort collections by:

show_subscriptions_plan.info: Plans will only show when subscription app is installed and at least 1 plan is activated.
show_subscriptions_plan.label: Show subscription plans

show_recipient_form.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products

sticky_add_to_cart.info: Keep add to cart button visible as customers browse and scroll.This displays on desktop only.
sticky_add_to_cart.label: Enable sticky add to cart

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other liquid code to create advanced customizations.
custom_liquid.label: Liquid

paragraph.content: You will receive an email every time someone fills in this form.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: This heading is required to show the product meta details in tab/accordion.

countdown_time.label: Sale end date
countdown_time.info: The end date must be set to a future date and include the following format: MM/DD/YYYY Example: 12/20/2023.

inventory_less_status.label: Low inventory status
inventory_less_status.info: To show inventory, use ||inventory|| in status

size_chart.label: Select size chart
size_chart.info: Get size chart from selected page's content. This content will override content above.

custom_size_chart.label: CUSTOM SIZE CHART
custom_size_chart.info: Show different size chart for specific collection or product. Create a custom metafield for product with namespace and key:'yuva_theme.size_chart'. [Add metafield](/admin/metafields/product).

accordion_content_alignment.info: This will be applicable to tabs style only.
accordion_content_alignment.label: Alignment

open_description_accordion.label: Open product description accordion by default

style.info: Not applicable to carousel gallery style.
style.label: Style

width.info: Not applicable to carousel gallery style.
width.label: Position

bgcolor.info: This is applicable if map is not full width.

paragraph.content: Add a Google Maps API key to the theme settings > Google Maps.

icon_image.label: Icon
icon_image.info: This image is required to show the sidebar icon.

show_social_share.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings -> social media.
show_social_share.label: Show social media icons

overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity
overlay_opacity.info: It is applicable only when background image is added

border_radius.info: Only applicable if the promotional banner is not full width.
border_radius.label: Border radius

paragraph.content: To make the text appear outlined, make it bold.

button_link.label: Link
button_link.info: If the button text is not added, this link will be applicable to the slide image.

image.info: 1117 x 844px recommended for style "Split" and 1920 x 844px recommended for style "Full width" .
image.label: Desktop image

bg.info: Only applicable when content shows below images on mobile

content_below_image.label: Show content below images on mobile

store_name.label: Store name
store_name.info: The store name needs to match the name of your store defined in your [location settings](/admin/settings/locations)

location.label: Location
location.info: Make sure that you have the Google Maps API added in theme settings>Google maps.

paragraph.content: There must be a minimum of one item to display this tab.

tabs_alignment.label: Heading and tabs position
tabs_alignment.info: It will not be applicable with "Right to heading" tabs position.

hide_tab_name.label: Hide tabs heading
hide_tab_name.info: It will only work with single tab.

show_tabs_border.label: Show tabs border
show_tabs_border.info: It will not be applicable with "Right to heading" tabs position.

autoplay.info: If autoplay is enabled then video will be muted.
autoplay.label: Enable autoplay

bg_pattern.info: Only applicable if full width is disabled
bg_pattern.label: Background pattern

poster.info: 1920 x 720px recommended. Poster will not be visible if autoplay is enabled.
poster.label: Cover image

product_list.label: Products
product_list.info: This has higher priority than the collection.

enable_browser_notification.info: This browser notification shows the cart items count only & it works with chrome and firefox browsers only.
enable_browser_notification.label: Enable browser notification

enable_shipping.info: To configure shipping rates, go to your [shipping settings](/admin/settings/shipping).
enable_shipping.label: Enable shipping bar

shipping.info: This feature only works with a shipping method. If you're using multiple shipping methods, it might show false values to the customer.

shipping_rate.info: Write a number, no letters or special characters.
shipping_rate.label: Minimum shipping price

shipping_text.info: Use ||amount|| to display the amount within the message.
shipping_text.label: Message

gift_wrap.info: Gift wrap needs to be set up as a product.

googlemapapi.info: You'll need to register a [Google Maps API Key](https://shinedezigninfonet.com/yuva-documentation/?locale=en#map_1) to display the map.
googlemapapi.label: Google maps API key

enable_lazyload.label: Enable lazyload
enable_lazyload.info: We recommend you to enable the lazy loading forever as unchecking this may impact your store speed.

header1.info: Apply this effect on your product images, it will hide the white background. Ideal for light-colored backgrounds and images with white backgrounds.

age_verify_popup_cookie.label: Set cookie for age verification popup(days)

enable_cookie_banner.info: For privacy banner to work you need to first activate customer privacy through Shopify admin [Online store > Preferences > Customer privacy](https://www.shopify.com/admin/online_store/preferences).
enable_cookie_banner.label: Enable privacy banner

hide_no_similar.label: Hide icon if no similar products found

show_grid_pickup.label: Show grid pickup availability
show_grid_pickup.info: This works after setting up the store locator section shown below the footer group.

enable_color_swatches.label: Enable color swatches
enable_color_swatches.info: Swatch action is not applicable with "Carousel" product image hover style.

product_grid_rounded.label: Show curved corners
product_grid_rounded.info: Applicable if "Rounded" is selected as layout style.

product_hover_auto_slide.info: Applicable if carousel is selected on product image hover.
product_hover_auto_slide.label: Enable auto slide

show_atc.info: It is visible only if product has 1 variant.
show_atc.label: Enable add to cart

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Show inventory quantity in red when quantity is below the threshold. Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

show_similar_text.label: Show similar button text on hover

enable_preorder.info: Preorder will work when, "Continue selling when out of stock" option is enabled. [How it works](https://shinedezigninfonet.com/yuva-documentation/#theme_setting_id).
enable_preorder.label: Enable preorder

color_name.info: The option name that holds the colors. E.g.: Color, Colour, Material, etc.
color_name.label: Color options name

size_name.info: The option name that holds the sizes. E.g.: Size, Measure, etc.
size_name.label: Size options name

variant_image.label: Show color option as variant image

custom_scrollToTop_svg.info: SVG should have width and height attributes.
custom_scrollToTop_svg.label: Svg code

show_scrollToTop_text.info: Only applicable if default icon is used.
show_scrollToTop_text.label: Show text

search_prompts.info: This will type in placeholder text into the search input, and provide a quick way to introduce customers to what the store sells.
